title: NexUScore
description: NexUSCore is a modern educational platform where users can explore and enroll in a wide variety of courses. Designed for flexibility and ease, learners can level up their skills at their own pace. It features dynamic course discovery, personalized dashboards, and secure authentication. The platform is fully responsive and optimized for both students and instructors.
fea1: Access the most popular and newly added courses
fea2: Easily explore courses by topic or interest
fea3: Track your progress and manage all your enrolled courses
fea4: Role-based dashboard for admin and students
fea6: Responsive design with optimized user experience
challenges: Implementing secure role-based access control and managing real-time updates with Firebase were technically challenging.
whatILearned: Gained deep understanding of React Router, JWT authentication flow, and efficient database querying in MongoDB.
futurePlans: Add real-time messaging between instructors and students, and implement progress-based certificates.

title: EventExplorar
description: EventExplorar is your ultimate event discovery platform. Whether it's workshops, festivals, or tech meetups, users can stay informed and engaged with the latest events. The site supports bookmarking and dynamic filtering based on interests. It is built with a focus on interactivity, smooth animations, and mobile-first design.
fea2: View full event descriptions, schedules and locations
fea3: Keep track of your booked events
fea4: Search and filter events by tags or locations
challenges: Handling time-zone-based event sorting and calendar-based filtering was tricky during development.
whatILearned: Improved state management and learned best practices for filtering, searching, and handling user input.
futurePlans: Plan to integrate Google Maps for venue visualization and allow users to submit their own events.

fea1: Create, edit, and organize personal recipes
